Package my.uum

Class ManageTournament

java.lang.Object
my.uum.ManageTournament
public class ManageTournament
extends java.lang.Object
This class is to manage (create, read, update, delete) the records of the tournament table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ManageTournament()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkExistTournamentIdDB​(java.lang.String checkExistTournamentID)
    This method is to check whether the entered tournament ID from the administrator is in the database.
    boolean checkTournamentDB​(java.lang.String checkTourID)
    This method is to check whether the entered tournament ID from the administrator is in the database.
    void createTournament()
    This method is to create new tournament details such as tournament ID, tournament date and its mode of play in the database.
    void createTournamentDB​(java.lang.String tID, java.lang.String tDate, java.lang.String tMode)
    This method is to insert the corresponding input from the administrator to the database.
    void deleteTournament()
    This method is to delete the tournament details by inserting the tournament ID you plan to remove it from the database.
    void deleteTournamentDB​(java.lang.String tIDToDelete)
    This method is to delete the tournament details with selected tournament ID.
    void readTournament()
    This method is to read all tournament details such as tournament ID, tournament date and its mode of play from the database.
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> readTournamentDB()
    This method is to select the tournament database table in order to read all the corresponding data.
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> readUpdatedTourDB​(java.lang.String currentTID)
    This method is to display the corresponding update tournament details from the tournament table database with the selected tournament ID.
    void updateTourDateDB​(java.lang.String tIDForUpdate, java.lang.String newTDate)
    This method is to update new tournament date entered by the administrator to the database.
    void updateTourModeDB​(java.lang.String tIDForUpdate, java.lang.String newTMode)
    This method is to update new tournament mode of play selected by the administrator to the database.
    void updateTournament()
    This method is to update the selected tournament details such as tournament date and its mode of play in the database by inserting the corresponding tournament ID.

      public ManageTournament()

  • Method Details

    • createTournament

      public void createTournament()
      This method is to create new tournament details such as tournament ID, tournament date and its mode of play in the database.

    • readTournament

      public void readTournament()
      This method is to read all tournament details such as tournament ID, tournament date and its mode of play from the database.

    • updateTournament

      public void updateTournament()
      This method is to update the selected tournament details such as tournament date and its mode of play in the database by inserting the corresponding tournament ID.

    • deleteTournament

      public void deleteTournament()
      This method is to delete the tournament details by inserting the tournament ID you plan to remove it from the database.

    • checkExistTournamentIdDB

      public boolean checkExistTournamentIdDB​(java.lang.String checkExistTournamentID)
      This method is to check whether the entered tournament ID from the administrator is in the database.
      Parameters:
      checkExistTournamentID - The tournament ID with the format of four digit numbers only.
      Returns:
      The result of the tournament ID whether is in the database.

    • createTournamentDB

      public void createTournamentDB​(java.lang.String tID, java.lang.String tDate, java.lang.String tMode)
      This method is to insert the corresponding input from the administrator to the database.
      Parameters:
      tID - The tournament ID with the format of four digit numbers only.
      tDate - The tournament date with the format of YYYY-MM-DD only.
      tMode - The tournament mode of play with the A to E option only.

    • readTournamentDB

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> readTournamentDB()
      This method is to select the tournament database table in order to read all the corresponding data.
      Returns:
      All tournament details from the database.

    • checkTournamentDB

      public boolean checkTournamentDB​(java.lang.String checkTourID)
      This method is to check whether the entered tournament ID from the administrator is in the database.
      Parameters:
      checkTourID - The tournament ID with the format of four digit numbers only in the database.
      Returns:
      The result of the tournament ID whether is in the database.

    • updateTourDateDB

      public void updateTourDateDB​(java.lang.String tIDForUpdate, java.lang.String newTDate)
      This method is to update new tournament date entered by the administrator to the database.
      Parameters:
      tIDForUpdate - The selected tournament ID that plans to update its tournament date.
      newTDate - The new tournament date with the format of YYYY-MM-DD only.

    • updateTourModeDB

      public void updateTourModeDB​(java.lang.String tIDForUpdate, java.lang.String newTMode)
      This method is to update new tournament mode of play selected by the administrator to the database.
      Parameters:
      tIDForUpdate - The selected tournament ID that plans to update its tournament mode of play.
      newTMode - The new tournament mode of play with the A to E option only.

    • readUpdatedTourDB

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> readUpdatedTourDB​(java.lang.String currentTID)
      This method is to display the corresponding update tournament details from the tournament table database with the selected tournament ID.
      Parameters:
      currentTID - To retrieve what details have been updated with the selected tournament ID.
      Returns:
      The update tournament details with the selected tournament ID.

    • deleteTournamentDB

      public void deleteTournamentDB​(java.lang.String tIDToDelete)
      This method is to delete the tournament details with selected tournament ID.
      Parameters:
      tIDToDelete - The detailed of the selected tournament ID will be deleted.
